title: FPS Issue since I came back
body: So I just took a 6 months break from league and I'm now back and enjoying it more than ever but the thing is I usually ended up running the game at 100 FPS in big team fights and now I usually get downed to 30 FPs which is a huge difference, I do not know if its the last patch that caused that or my game is just broken but I'd like some reports, thanks! ^^

replies.body: Since it's been a decent amount of time since you last played, there might be a few driver updates that would help boost those frames back up to 100. Check for any missed graphics driver updates, and run through the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well. Let me know if that doesn't help out!
